languages.text: "Мои душа и тело принадлежали Богу-Императору, но я подвел его". {n}Горькая усмешка отражается на лице Каллигоса.{/n} "Похоже, права была святоша Инцендия..."

traits.locale_text: "Мои душа и тело принадлежали Богу-императору, но я подвел его". {n}Горькая усмешка отражается на лице Каллигоса.{/n} "Похоже, права была святоша Инцендия..."

languages.text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."
languages.original_text: "Мои душа и тело принадлежали Богу-Императору, но я подвел его". {n}Горькая усмешка отражается на лице Каллигоса.{/n} "Похоже, права была святоша Инцендия..."

traits.locale_text: "My body and soul belonged to the God-Emperor, but I let Him down." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that holier-than-thou Incendia was right..."
"My body and soul belonged to the God-Emperor, but I let Him down." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that holier-than-thou Incendia was right..."
"My body and soul belonged to the God-Emperor, but I let Him down." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that holier-than-thou Incendia was right..."
"My body and soul belonged to the God-Emperor, but I let Him down." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that holier-than-thou Incendia was right..."
"My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."
"My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

languages.text: «Mi cuerpo y mi alma debían pertenecer al Dios Emperador, pero le he fallado». {n}Los labios de Calligos se estiran en una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Al final resulta que esa santurrona de Incendia tenía razón...».
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

traits.locale_text: «Mi cuerpo y mi alma pertenecían al Dios Emperador, pero le he defraudado». {n}Los labios de Calligos se estiran en una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Al final resulta que esa santurrona de Incendia tenía razón...».

languages.text: “我的身体与灵魂本该属于神皇，但我却辜负了祂。”{n}卡里戈斯的嘴角掠过一丝苦涩的笑容。{/n}“到头来，那个满心正义的因森蒂娅说得没错……”
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

traits.locale_text: “我的身体与灵魂都属于神皇，但我辜负了祂。”{n}卡里戈斯的嘴角掠过一丝苦涩的笑容。{/n}“看来，那个自诩圣洁的因森蒂娅说得没错……”

languages.text: « Je devais 'appartenir corps et âme à l'Empereur-Dieu, mais je L'ai trahi, {n}admet Calligos avec un sourire amer.{/n} Ainsi, cette moralisatrice d'Incendia avait raison... »
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

traits.locale_text: « J'appartenais corps et âme à l'Empereur-Dieu, mais je l'ai trahi, {n}admet Calligos avec un sourire amer.{/n} Ainsi, cette moralisatrice d'Incendia avait raison... »

languages.text: 「俺の肉体と魂は神帝陛下のものだったが、俺は皇帝を失望させてしまったようだ」{n}カリゴスの唇に苦笑いが浮かぶ。{/n}「あの聖人ぶったインセンディアのヤツが正しかったようだな…」
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の肉体と魂は神帝陛下のものだったが、俺は皇帝を失望させてしまったようだ」{n}カリゴスの唇に苦笑いが浮かぶ。{/n}「あの聖人ぶったインセンディアのヤツが正しかったようだな…」

languages.text: "Mein Körper und meine Seele waren dazu bestimmt, dem Gottimperator zu gehören, doch ich habe ihn enttäuscht." {n}Ein bitteres Lächeln huscht über Calligos' Lippen.{/n} "Die rechtschaffene Incendia hatte offenbar doch recht ..."
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Körper und meine Seele gehörten dem Gottimperator, doch ich habe ihn enttäuscht." {n}Ein bitteres Lächeln huscht über Calligos' Lippen.{/n} "Die frömmelnde Incendia hatte offenbar recht ..."

languages.text: "Bedenimin de ruhumun da Tanrı İmparator'a ait olması gerek ama ben O'nu hayal kırıklığına uğrattım." {n}Calligos'un dudaklarında bir anlığına acı bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre erdemli İncendia, gerçekten haklıymış..."
languages.original_text: "My body and soul were meant to belong to the God-Emperor, but I have failed Him." {n}A bitter smile crosses Calligos's lips.{/n} "It seems that our righteous Incendia was right after all..."
